Class PointListImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.PointListImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointList
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexedTriangleMeshImpl

    public class PointListImpl
extends Object
implements PointList
    A straightforward implementation of the PointList interface backed by a list of Vector3 objects.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

    • Constructor Detail

      • PointListImpl

        public PointListImpl(List<Vector3> points)
        Creates a new point list backed by the specified list of vectors. The list is stored by reference and should not be modified.
        Parameters:
        points - the list of points
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either the argument or an element of the list is null
